p: Recent randomized trials have reported improvements in progression-free and overall survival with aggressive treatments directed at oligometastases [ 12– 15], including stereotactic ablative radiotherapy (SABR). The application of ablative therapies for patients with 4–10 metastatic sites is being evaluated in the randomized phase III COMET-10 trial [ 16] where patients are randomized to ablative SABR to all sites of disease versus standard of care treatment.
